20110129040013.000|20110129040016.000|TR0|on sunrise in Egypt right now, waiting, 
20110129040016.000|20110129040018.000|TR0|along with the rest of the world, for what 
20110129040018.000|20110129040020.000|TR0|happens next.  Israel's neighbor, 
20110129040020.000|20110129040022.000|TR0|America's ally, capital of the Arab world 
20110129040022.000|20110129040025.000|TR0|in crisis, under curfew, the government in 
20110129040025.000|20110129040027.000|TR0|flux, the man who has run the country for 
20110129040027.000|20110129040029.000|TR0|decades apparently on the ropes with his 
20110129040029.000|20110129040032.000|TR0|people and clearly on notice from 
20110129040032.000|20110129040034.000|TR0|Washington.

20110129040041.000|20110129040043.000|TR0|streets en masse today and late into the 
20110129040043.000|20110129040045.000|TR0|night; a day of rage that began in the 
20110129040045.000|20110129040048.000|TR0|mosques and spread into the centers of 
20110129040048.000|20110129040050.000|TR0|Cairo and Alexandria, Egypt's second city,

20110129040919.000|20110129040921.000|TR0|where one man went up against the police 
20110129040921.000|20110129040924.000|TR0|with his hands in the air.  There were 
20110129040924.000|20110129040926.000|TR0|rocks thrown from the crowd behind him at 
20110129040926.000|20110129040928.000|TR0|police.  The police were throwing the 
20110129040928.000|20110129040930.000|TR0|rocks back.  And he calmed the situation 
20110129040930.000|20110129040933.000|TR0|himself.  And the crowds talked to the 
20110129040933.000|20110129040935.000|TR0|police, and the police backed off.  More 
20110129040935.000|20110129040937.000|TR0|rocks flew, and the police fled.

20110129041034.000|20110129041037.000|TR0|years old.  So, normally, he -- he stopped 
20110129041037.000|20110129041039.000|TR0|doing live appearances a few years ago.

20110129044733.000|20110129044736.000|TR0|Anyway, one of those plain-clothes

20110129044743.000|20110129044745.000|TR0|

20110129045750.000|20110129045752.000|TR0|health isn't normal, I go to the hospital

20110129045754.000|20110129045757.000|TR0|

20110129045759.000|20110129045801.000|TR0|
20110129045801.000|20110129045803.000|TR0|YUVAL ROTH, CNN HERO, COMMUNITY CRUSADER:  
20110129045803.000|20110129045806.000|TR0|In Palestine, healthcare is very 
20110129045806.000|20110129045808.000|TR0|expensive.  It's not accessible.  It's a 
20110129045808.000|20110129045810.000|TR0|big difference between the life here and 
20110129045810.000|20110129045813.000|TR0|one minute away.
20110129045813.000|20110129045815.000|TR0|
20110129045815.000|20110129045817.000|TR0|My name is Yuval Roth.  We transport sick 
20110129045817.000|20110129045819.000|TR0|Palestinians from the occupied territory 
20110129045819.000|20110129045822.000|TR0|into the Israeli hospitals.  If they 
20110129045822.000|20110129045824.000|TR0|should take a taxi, it would cost them a 
20110129045824.000|20110129045826.000|TR0|lot of money.  They can't afford it.
20110129045826.000|20110129045829.000|TR0|
20110129045829.000|20110129045831.000|TR0|My brother, he was murdered by Hamas 
20110129045831.000|20110129045833.000|TR0|people.  That caused me to do something.  
20110129045833.000|20110129045835.000|TR0|Not in terms of revenge, but to look for a
